media

Interface Decoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DecoderXuggle

    public interface Decoder
    Interface for media decoder. The decoder should open a music video container to read packets and timestamps The interface decouples and all types have been made generic, using the adapter pattern, for use in other frameworks
    Author:
    Tony
